record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2334, S. 2340, S. 2346, S. 2348, AND H.R. 3996, EN BLOC
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2334, S. 2340, S. 2346, S. 2348, AND H.R. 3996, EN BLOC -- (Senate - November 13, 2007)

[Page: S14349]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are five bills at the desk and I ask for their first reading en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

A bill (S. 2334) to withhold 10 percent of the Federal funding apportioned for highway construction and maintenance from States that issue driver's licenses to individuals without verifying the legal status of such individual.
A bill (S. 2340) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

A bill (S. 2346) to temporarily increase the portfolio caps applicable to Freddie Mac and Fannie Mae, to provide the necessary financing to curb foreclosures by facilitating the refinancing of at-risk subprime borrowers into safe, affordable loans, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 2348) to ensure control over the United States border and to strengthen enforcement of the immigration laws.
A bill (H.R. 3996) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend certain expiring provisions and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for their second reading en bloc, but I object to my own request en bloc.
Mr. President, I note the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.
The Senator from Georgia is recognized.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
